### Chart A

```{r}
library(writexl)
library(readxl)
file_path <- "C:/Users/Administrator/Downloads/2024_indexofeconomicfreedom_data.xlsx"
data1 <- read_excel(file_path)
file_path <- "C:/Users/Administrator/Downloads/internet-users-by-country-2024.csv"
data2 <- read.csv(file_path)
colnames(data2)[colnames(data2) == "country"] <- "Country"
merged_data <- merge(data1, data2, by = "Country")
merged_data[merged_data == "N/A"] <- NA
cleaned_data <- na.omit(merged_data)
x1 <- cleaned_data$`Financial Freedom`
x2 <- cleaned_data$`Tax Burden`
y <- cleaned_data$InternetTrafficPercofResidentsWithInternetAccess
multiple_regression <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, data = cleaned_data)
summary(multiple_regression)
```
